alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Peninsula and Selawik Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued August 26 at 2:46PM AKDT until August 28 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON SUNDAY TO 6 AM AKDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves will wash surf to the top of the beach. * WHERE...Baldwin Peninsula and Selawik Valley. * WHEN...From noon Sunday to 6 AM AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Localized beach erosion will occur. Items left on the beach will wash away. Debris will wash onto beaches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will turn northwest on Sunday and with gusts 30 to 40 mph Sunday afternoon and Sunday night. These winds will push waves to the top of the beach causing erosion and washing away items left on the beach. The worst conditions will be on northwest facing beaches such as at Kotzebue.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property.
